docket_entries.description: Affidavit of Service re: Notice of Filing of the Schedule of Executory Contracts and Unexpired Leases Proposed to Be Rejected Pursuant to the Third Amended Proposed Joint Chapter 11 Plan of Reorganization of The Reader's Digest Association, Inc. and Its Debtor Affiliates [Docket No. 367] (related document(s) 367 ) filed by Kurtzman Carson Consultants LLC.(Schepper, Christopher) (Entered: 02/16/2010)
